column1: 95440946$Eldlich the Golden Lord$$LIGHT$[Zombie/effect]$$$$$10$2500$2800$$$$You can send this card and 1 Spell/Trap from your hand to the GY
column2: then target 1 card on the field; send it to the GY. If this card is in your GY: You can send 1 Spell/Trap you control to the GY; add this card to your hand
column3: then you can Special Summon 1 Zombie monster from your hand
column5: until the end of your opponent's turn
column6: it gains 1000 ATK/DEF and cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can only use each effect of "Eldlich the Golden Lord" once per turn.$$$$$
